p: A review of articles in Le Monde referring to climate change and health was conducted covering the time period from the release of the first Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) report in 1990 to the end of the 21st Conference of the Parties (COP21) climate negotiations held in Paris in December 2015. Moreover, during the 6Â months prior to the conference, tweets referring to the COP21 were collated and the frequency and manner in which the issue was addressed was analysed.
